title: Job-Integrated Remote Mathematics Education: Designing Flexible Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in secondary mathematics education and practical application
context.additional_context: A course for in-service secondary mathematics teachers to learn flexible remote education strategies adaptable to their own classroom contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design effective mathematics lessons in smartphone environments using real-time video conferencing tools
Learners can explain customized assignment design methods considering flexible learning time and space
Learners can implement feedback systems that enhance learner engagement based on formative assessment data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
